remarks: Norm of differences around common element.  Part of Lemma 3.6 of [Beran] p. 101.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Apr-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: norm3dif $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H /\ C e. ~H ) -> ( normh ` ( A -h B ) ) <_ ( ( normh ` ( A -h C ) ) + ( normh ` ( C -h B ) ) ) ) $.
